approve.notice: Set allowance for other address, Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens on your behalf

approveAndCall.notice: Set allowance for other address and notify, Allows `_spender` to spend no more than `_value` tokens in your behalf, and then ping the contract about it

burn.notice: Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly

burnFrom.notice: Destroy tokens from other account. Remove `_value` tokens from the system irreversibly on behalf of `_from`.

buy.notice: --DISABLED-- Request XFF tokens on Github repo

freezeAccount.notice: Prevent | Allow `target` from sending & receiving tokens

mintToken.notice: Create `mintedAmount` tokens and send it to `target`

setPrices.notice: Allow users to buy tokens for `newBuyPrice` eth and sell tokens for `newSellPrice` eth

balanceOf.notice: Check balance at a given address

frozenAccount.notice: Check whether a given address is frozen

transfer.notice: Send `_value` tokens to `_to` from your account

transferFrom.notice: Send `_value` tokens to `_to` on behalf of `_from`

transferOwnership.notice: Transfer contract ownership to another address
